TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit MemberInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider, class System.Runtime.InteropServices._MemberInfo
Public MustInherit Class MemberInfo Implements _MemberInfo, ICustomAttributeProvider
type MemberInfo = class interface ICustomAttributeProvider interface _MemberInfo

summary.span: 获取有关成员属性的信息并提供对成员元数据的访问权限。

span.span: Obtains information about the attributes of a member and provides access to member metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用来获取所有成员 （构造函数、 事件、 字段、 方法和属性） 的类的相关信息的类的抽象基类。The class is the abstract base class for classes used to obtain information about all members of a class (constructors, events, fields, methods, and properties). 此类介绍了所有成员都提供的基本功能。This class introduces the basic functionality that all members provide. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用各种反射类来分析包含在程序集中的元数据。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任代码继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
This type is thread safe.

para.span: 继承自必须重写以下成员：和。

span.span: When you inherit from you must override the following members: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在派生的类可以创建此`MemberInfo`类。Only a derived class can create this `MemberInfo` class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Type DeclaringType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type DeclaringType
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DeclaringType As Type
public: abstract property Type ^ DeclaringType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取声明该成员的类。

span.span: Gets the class that declares this member.

value.span: 声明该成员的类的 对象。

span.span: The object for the class that declares this member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索到的引用声明此成员的类型的对象。The property retrieves a reference to the object for the type that declares this member. 由类型声明或继承自基类型，类型的成员，因此`Type`返回的对象属性可能与相同`Type`对象，用于获取当前对象。A member of a type is either declared by the type or inherited from a base type, so the `Type` object returned by the property might not be the same as the `Type` object used to obtain the current object. - 如果`Type`此对象`MemberInfo`获取了未声明此成员属性将表示其基类型之一。If the `Type` object from which this `MemberInfo` object was obtained did not declare this member, the property will represent one of its base types. - 如果`MemberInfo`对象是全局成员 (即，如果已获取了从方法，返回对模块全局方法)，返回将`null`。If the `MemberInfo` object is a global member (that is, if it was obtained from the method, which returns global methods on a module), the returned will be `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个接口， `IValue`，使用一个成员， `GetValue`。The following example defines an interface, `IValue`, with a single member, `GetValue`. 它还定义了四个类： `A`，实现的基类`IValue`接口;`B`，后者又继承`A`，并隐藏其实现`GetValue`从基类实现;`C`，只需继承`A`; 并`D`，后者又继承`A`并重写其`GetValue`方法。It also defines four classes: `A`, a base class that implements the `IValue` interface; `B`, which inherits from `A` and hides its implementation of `GetValue` from the base class implementation; `C`, which simply inherits from `A`; and `D`, which inherits from `A` and overrides its `GetValue` method. 该示例然后检索类型的每个成员的对象 (包括成员继承自)，并显示的值及其属性。The example then retrieves a object for each member of the type (including members inherited from ) and displays the value of its property. [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example/CS/Example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example/VB/Example2.vb#2)] 请注意，声明类型`A.GetValue`是`A`，则该`B`包含两个`GetValue`方法、 一个由声明`A`，另一个通过`B`，和，声明类型的`D.GetValue`是`D`。Note that the declaring type of `A.GetValue` is `A`, that `B` includes two `GetValue` methods, one declared by `A` and one by `B`, and that the declaring type of `D.GetValue` is `D`. > [!NOTE] > `DeclaringType` 返回仅成员名称和其声明类型的名称。`DeclaringType` returns only the member names and the names of their declaring types. 若要返回的成员具有其原型的名称，请调用`MemberInfo.ToString`。To return the member names with their prototypes, call `MemberInfo.ToString`.

abstract member GetCustomAttributes : bool -> obj[]

param.name: inherit
param.span: 如果要搜索此成员的继承链以查找属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, .

param.span: 会忽略属性和事件的此参数。

span.span: This parameter is ignored for properties and events.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回应用于此成员的所有自定义属性的数组。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of all custom attributes applied to this member.

returns.span: 一个包含应用于此成员的所有自定义属性的数组，或者在未定义任何特性时为包含零个元素的数组。

span.span: An array that contains all the custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero elements if no attributes are defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会忽略`inherit`属性和事件的参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要搜索的属性和事件属性的继承链，使用的适当重载方法。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此方法返回安全特性在方法、 构造函数和类型就是存储在新的元数据格式。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes on methods, constructors, and types if they are stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本 2.0 编译的程序集使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 动态程序集和与早期版本的.NET Framework 编译的程序集使用旧的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 请参阅[发出的声明性安全特性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下面的示例定义自定义属性并将与属性相关联`MyClass.MyMethod`，在运行时，检索该属性，并显示结果。The following example defines a custom attribute and associates the attribute with `MyClass.MyMethod`, retrieves the attribute at run time, and displays the result. [!code-cpp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/CPP/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/CS/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/VB/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.vb#1)]

span.span: See [How to: Load Assemblies into the Reflection-Only Context](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-load-assemblies-into-the-reflection-only-context.md).

span.span: An array of custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero elements if no attributes assignable to have been applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会忽略`inherit`属性和事件的参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要搜索的属性和事件属性的继承链，使用的适当重载方法。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此方法返回的安全属性的方法、 构造函数和类型如果属性存储在新的元数据格式。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes on methods, constructors, and types if the attributes are stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本 2.0 编译的程序集使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 动态程序集和与早期版本的.NET Framework 编译的程序集使用旧的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 请参阅[发出的声明性安全特性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个名为`BaseClass`具有两个非继承的成员： 一个名为线程静态字段`total`和一个名为符合 cls 的方法`MethodA`。The following example defines a class named `BaseClass` that has two non-inherited members: a thread static field named `total` and a non-CLS-compliant method named `MethodA`. 名为的类`DerivedClass`继承自`BaseClass`并重写其`MethodA`方法。A class named `DerivedClass` inherits from `BaseClass` and overrides its `MethodA` method. 请注意，将任何属性应用于的成员`DerivedClass`。Note that no attributes are applied to the members of `DerivedClass`. 该示例循环访问的成员`DerivedClass`来确定是否或特性，如已应用到它们。The example iterates the members of `DerivedClass` to determine whether the or attribute as been applied to them. 因为`inherit`是`true`，该方法将搜索的继承层次结构`DerivedClass`为指定的特性。Because `inherit` is `true`, the method searches the inheritance hierarchy of `DerivedClass` for the specified attribute. 作为输出的示例所示，从`total`字段用修饰属性，并`MethodA`方法使用修饰属性。As the output from the example shows, the `total` field is decorated with the attribute, and the `MethodA` method is decorated with the attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes/cs/GetCustomAttributes1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes/vb/GetCustomAttributes1.vb#1)]

abstract member GetCustomAttributesData : unit -> System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData> override this.GetCustomAttributesData : unit -> System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData>

summary.span: 返回 对象列表，这些对象表示已应用到目标成员的特性相关数据。

span.span: Returns a list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

returns.span: 对象的泛型列表，表示有关已应用于目标成员的特性的数据。

span.span: A generic list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于检查代码中的仅限反射的上下文，在其中加载到仅反射上下文的代码中定义的自定义特性本身的情况下的自定义特性。Use this method to examine the custom attributes of code in the reflection-only context, in cases where the custom attributes themselves are defined in code that is loaded into the reflection-only context. 等方法和能在这种情况下，因为它们创建特性的实例。Methods like and cannot be used in such cases, because they create instances of the attributes. 不能执行仅限反射上下文中的代码。Code in the reflection-only context cannot be executed. 有关详细信息和有关示例代码，请参阅类。For more information and for example code, see the class. 此方法获取自定义属性数据类型、 嵌套的类型和类型成员，因为类和中的类表示所有派生的类型成员的命名空间。This method gets custom attribute data for types, nested types, and type members, because the class and the classes in the namespace that represent type members all derive from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会忽略`inherit`属性和事件的参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要搜索的属性和事件属性的继承链，使用的适当重载方法。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此方法返回`true`类型、 方法或构造函数具有新的元数据格式存储的安全属性。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns `true` if a type, method, or constructor has security attributes stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本 2.0 编译的程序集使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 动态程序集和与早期版本的.NET Framework 编译的程序集使用旧的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 请参阅[发出的声明性安全特性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下面的示例确定是否将指定的特性应用于指定的成员。The following example determines whether the specified attribute is applied to the specified member. [!code-cpp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CPP/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CS/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/VB/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.vb#1)]

Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MemberType As MemberTypes

member this.MemberType : System.Reflection.MemberTypes

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取 值，该值指示成员类型 - 方法、构造函数、事件等。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating the type of the member — method, constructor, event, and so on.

value.span: 指示成员类型的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the type of member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中重写此属性和重写将返回相应的成员类型。This property is overridden in derived classes, and the override returns the appropriate member type. 因此，检查一系列对象，例如，返回的数组—属性可以用于确定任何给定成员的成员类型。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects — for example, the array returned by — the property can be used to determine the member type of any given member. 若要获取`MemberType`属性，获取类。To get the `MemberType` property, get the class . 从`Type`，获取数组。From the `Type`, get the array. 从`MethodInfo`数组中获取`MemberTypes`。From the `MethodInfo` array, get the `MemberTypes`. ## Examples 以下示例显示的成员名称和指定类的类型。The following example displays the member name and type of a specified class. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值标识元数据元素。

span.span: Gets a value that identifies a metadata element.

value.span: 结合 ，该值能够唯一标识元数据元素。

span.span: A value which, in combination with , uniquely identifies a metadata element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性获取的令牌可以传递到非托管反射 API。The tokens obtained using this property can be passed to the unmanaged reflection API. 有关详细信息，请参阅[非托管反射 API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8)。For more information, please see [Unmanaged Reflection API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8). > [!NOTE] > 使用非托管的反射 API 需要熟悉的公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Using the unmanaged reflection API requires familiarity with the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 当前 表示数组方法（如 ），针对元素类型是尚未完成的动态类型的数组类型。

span.span: The current represents an array method, such as , on an array type whose element type is a dynamic type that has not been completed.

exception.span: 若要在这种情况下获取元数据标记，将 对象传递给 方法；或使用 方法直接获取标记，而不是首先使用 方法获取 。

span.span: To get a metadata token in this case, pass the object to the method; or use the method to get the token directly, instead of using the method to get a first.

summary.span: 获取一个模块，在该模块中已经定义一个类型，该类型用于声明由当前 表示的成员。

span.span: Gets the module in which the type that declares the member represented by the current is defined.

value.span: ，在其中已经定义一个类型，该类型用于声明由当前 表示的成员。

span.span: The in which the type that declares the member represented by the current is defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为方便起见提供此属性。This property is provided as a convenience. 它相当于使用属性来获取该方法声明的类型并调用生成的属性对象。It is equivalent to using the property to get the type in which the method is declared, and then calling the property of the resulting object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例声明继承的类并重写。The following code example declares a class that inherits and overrides . 此示例获取类的对象`ToString`方法以及继承方法，并显示在其中声明两个方法的模块的名称。The example obtains objects for the class's `ToString` method and for the inherited method, and displays the names of the modules in which the two methods are declared. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This method is not implemented.

summary.span: 获取当前成员的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the current member.
A containing the name of this member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅该成员的简单名称被返回不是完全限定的名称。Only the simple name of the member is returned, not the fully qualified name. 若要获取属性，获取类。To get the property, get the class . 从`Type`，获取数组。From the `Type`, get the array. 从`MemberInfo`元素的数组，获得`Name`属性。From a `MemberInfo` element of the array, obtain the `Name` property. ## Examples 此示例列出`Name`和`DeclaringType`指定类的每个成员的属性。This example lists the `Name` and `DeclaringType` property of each member of the specified class. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取用于获取 的此实例的类对象。

span.span: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance of .

value.span: 对象，通过它获取了此 对象。

span.span: The object through which this object was obtained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReflectedType`属性检索对象，用于获取此实例的`MemberInfo`。The `ReflectedType` property retrieves the object that was used to obtain this instance of `MemberInfo`. 这可能与不同的值如果此属性对象表示从基类继承的成员。This may differ from the value of the property if this object represents a member that is inherited from a base class. 如果`MemberInfo`对象是全局成员 (即，如果已获取了从方法，返回对模块全局方法)，返回将`null`。If the `MemberInfo` object is a global member (that is, if it was obtained from the method, which returns global methods on a module), the returned will be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何发生更改时成员从查看从此类型以及从从获取类本身继承 ，但不会重写。The following code example shows how the changes when the member is viewed from a obtained from type and from a obtained from the class itself, which inherits but does not override . [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
